verses.text_plain: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

verses.text_plain: Thus speaketh the Lord God of Israel, saying, Write thee all the words that I have spoken unto thee in a book.
verses.verse_html: 2Thus speaketh the Lord God of Israel, saying, Write thee all the words that I have spoken unto thee in a book.

verses.text_plain: For, lo, the days come, saith the Lord, that I will bring again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, saith the Lord: and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.
verses.verse_html: 3For, lo, the days come, saith the Lord, that I will bring again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, saith the Lord: and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.

tokens.text: and I will cause them to return

verses.text_plain: And these are the words that the Lord spake concerning Israel and concerning Judah.
verses.verse_html: 4And these are the words that the Lord spake concerning Israel and concerning Judah.

verses.text_plain: For thus saith the Lord; We have heard a voice of trembling, of fear, and not of peace.
verses.verse_html:
5For thus saith the Lord; We have heard a voice of trembling, of fear, and not of peace. ▼
▼ of fear…: or, there is fear, and not peace

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of fear…: or, there is fear, and not peace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of fear…: or, there is fear, and not peace

verses.text_plain: Ask ye now, and see whether a man doth travail with child? wherefore do I see every man with his hands on his loins, as a woman in travail, and all faces are turned into paleness?
verses.verse_html:
6Ask ye now, and see whether a man doth travail with child? wherefore do I see every man with his hands on his loins, as a woman in travail, and all faces are turned into paleness? ▼
▼ a man: Heb. a male

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a man: Heb. a male

verses.text_plain: Alas! for that day is great, so that none is like it: it is even the time of Jacob’s trouble; but he shall be saved out of it.
verses.verse_html: 7Alas! for that day is great, so that none is like it: it is even the time of Jacob’s trouble; but he shall be saved out of it.

verses.text_plain: For it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord of hosts, that I will break his yoke from off thy neck, and will burst thy bonds, and strangers shall no more serve themselves of him:
verses.verse_html: 8For it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord of hosts, that I will break his yoke from off thy neck, and will burst thy bonds, and strangers shall no more serve themselves of him:

tokens.text: For it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: But they shall serve the Lord their God, and David their king, whom I will raise up unto them.
verses.verse_html: 9But they shall serve the Lord their God, and David their king, whom I will raise up unto them.

verses.text_plain: Therefore fear thou not, O my servant Jacob, saith the Lord; neither be dismayed, O Israel: for, lo, I will save thee from afar, and thy seed from the land of their captivity; and Jacob shall return, and shall be in rest, and be quiet, and none shall make him afraid.
verses.verse_html: 10Therefore fear thou not, O my servant Jacob, saith the Lord; neither be dismayed, O Israel: for, lo, I will save thee from afar, and thy seed from the land of their captivity; and Jacob shall return, and shall be in rest, and be quiet, and none shall make him afraid.

verses.text_plain: For I am with thee, saith the Lord, to save thee: though I make a full end of all nations whither I have scattered thee, yet will I not make a full end of thee: but I will correct thee in measure, and will not leave thee altogether unpunished.
verses.verse_html: 11For I am with thee, saith the Lord, to save thee: though I make a full end of all nations whither I have scattered thee, yet will I not make a full end of thee: but I will correct thee in measure, and will not leave thee altogether unpunished.

tokens.text: thee, yet will I not make
of thee: but I will correct
and will not leave thee altogether

verses.text_plain: For thus saith the Lord, Thy bruise is incurable, and thy wound is grievous.
verses.verse_html: 12For thus saith the Lord, Thy bruise is incurable, and thy wound is grievous.

verses.text_plain: There is none to plead thy cause, that thou mayest be bound up: thou hast no healing medicines.
verses.verse_html:
13There is none to plead thy cause, that thou mayest be bound up: thou hast no healing medicines. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. for binding up, or, pressing

tokens.text: that thou mayest be bound up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ that…: Heb. for binding up, or, pressing
footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. for binding up, or, pressing

verses.text_plain: All thy lovers have forgotten thee; they seek thee not; for I have wounded thee with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the multitude of thine iniquity; because thy sins were increased.
verses.verse_html: 14All thy lovers have forgotten thee; they seek thee not; for I have wounded thee with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the multitude of thine iniquity; because thy sins were increased.

tokens.text: thee not; for I have wounded

verses.text_plain: Why criest thou for thine affliction? thy sorrow is incurable for the multitude of thine iniquity: because thy sins were increased, I have done these things unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 15Why criest thou for thine affliction? thy sorrow is incurable for the multitude of thine iniquity: because thy sins were increased, I have done these things unto thee.

verses.text_plain: Therefore all they that devour thee shall be devoured; and all thine adversaries, every one of them, shall go into captivity; and they that spoil thee shall be a spoil, and all that prey upon thee will I give for a prey.
verses.verse_html: 16Therefore all they that devour thee shall be devoured; and all thine adversaries, every one of them, shall go into captivity; and they that spoil thee shall be a spoil, and all that prey upon thee will I give for a prey.

tokens.text: every one of them, shall go

verses.text_plain: For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the Lord; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.
verses.verse_html: 17For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the Lord; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.

tokens.text: unto thee, and I will heal

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I will bring again the captivity of Jacob’s tents, and have mercy on his dwellingplaces; and the city shall be builded upon her own heap, and the palace shall remain after the manner thereof.
verses.verse_html:
18Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I will bring again the captivity of Jacob’s tents, and have mercy on his dwellingplaces; and the city shall be builded upon her own heap, and the palace shall remain after the manner thereof. ▼
▼ heap: or, little hill

footnotes.body_html: ▼ heap: or, little hill

verses.text_plain: And out of them shall proceed thanksgiving and the voice of them that make merry: and I will multiply them, and they shall not be few; I will also glorify them, and they shall not be small.
verses.verse_html: 19And out of them shall proceed thanksgiving and the voice of them that make merry: and I will multiply them, and they shall not be few; I will also glorify them, and they shall not be small.

tokens.text: And out of them shall proceed
them, and they shall not be few
them, and they shall not be small

verses.text_plain: Their children also shall be as aforetime, and their congregation shall be established before me, and I will punish all that oppress them.
verses.verse_html: 20Their children also shall be as aforetime, and their congregation shall be established before me, and I will punish all that oppress them.

verses.text_plain: And their nobles shall be of themselves, and their governor shall proceed from the midst of them; and I will cause him to draw near, and he shall approach unto me: for who is this that engaged his heart to approach unto me? saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 21And their nobles shall be of themselves, and their governor shall proceed from the midst of them; and I will cause him to draw near, and he shall approach unto me: for who is this that engaged his heart to approach unto me? saith the Lord.

tokens.text: shall be of themselves, and their governor
of them; and I will cause him to draw near

verses.text_plain: And ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
verses.verse_html: 22And ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.

tokens.text: And ye shall be my people
and I will be your God

verses.text_plain: Behold, the whirlwind of the Lord goeth forth with fury, a continuing whirlwind: it shall fall with pain upon the head of the wicked.
verses.verse_html:
23Behold, the whirlwind of the Lord goeth forth with fury, a continuing whirlwind: it shall fall with pain upon the head of the wicked. ▼
▼ continuing: Heb. cutting
 , ▼
▼ fall…: or, remain

verses.text_plain: The fierce anger of the Lord shall not return, until he have done it, and until he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days ye shall consider it.
verses.verse_html: 24The fierce anger of the Lord shall not return, until he have done it, and until he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days ye shall consider it.
